sentence: In the last year, weve seen coordinated attacks on the legitimacy of our government, and meanwhile, Republicans all over the country including Brian Kemp and David Perdue are abandoning any concern for our future.
title: Hillary Clinton Is Back & She's Ready To Help Stacey Abrams (D) Become Governor

sentence: "Reminder: Brian Kemp stole the gubernatorial election from Georgians and Stacey Abrams," Jean-Pierre tweeted on April 2, 2020, reacting to a news story about Kemp saying he only just learned that asymptomatic people can spread COVID-19.
author: Jessica Chasmar
title: Biden's new WH press secretary claimed Trump, GA Gov. Kemp 'stole' elections

sentence: Under the once-in-a-decade redistricting process, Georgias Republican governor, Brian Kemp, signed into law a new map that transformed Ms. McBaths district to favor Republicans overwhelmingly.
title: Two Democratic Congresswomen, One Redrawn Georgia District
